name: ALPODs Operator
description: Performs cluster classification using the ALPODs (Algorithmic Population Descriptions) algorithm.

properties.name: min_samples_pct
properties.description: Minimum percentage of dataset size required to split a node (ALPODS standard: 1%)

properties.name: effect_size_threshold
properties.description: Cohen's d effect size threshold for relevant subpopulations (0.2=small, 0.5=medium, 0.8=large)

properties.name: abc_threshold_a
properties.description: ABC analysis A-category threshold (top populations contributing to 80% of total effect)

properties.name: abc_threshold_b
properties.description: ABC analysis B-category threshold (populations contributing up to 95% of total effect)

properties.name: max_populations
properties.description: Maximum number of populations to return (7Â±2 rule for human comprehension)

properties.name: simpson_bins
properties.description: Number of bins for Simpson Index calculation (higher = more precise, slower)
